channel.title: RuneStuff PK is looking for staff and developers!
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]RuneStuff[/b][/size][/center] [center]The Ressurection[/center]
Some people that have been around since 2007 might remember a dodian server called RuneStuff, im back on the ps scene and i thought i would try to ressurect it, in PK style. The home is lumbridge, and the XP rate is pretty high, because the server is mainly for pking. Im looking for staff to help out, a host, and possibly a forum maker.
Staff Spots:
[center]Admins -- --[/center]
[center]Mods -- -- --[/center]
[center]Website/Forum maker Pure2Ownage[/center]
[center]Host --[/center]
If you want to join, just say so, say a little about yourself. I dont believe in templates :D
I have add me on msn if you want to talk
Now a few screenshots. (THIS IS A DRAGZSCAPE SOURCE), i haven't changed much yet, but i plan to. Also the server will be accessable via a Silabsoft client!
[URL=http://filesmelt.com/][IMG]http://filesmelt.com/dl/jad.PNG[/img][/URL] [URL=http://filesmelt.com/][IMG]http://filesmelt.com/dl/training.PNG[/img][/URL] [URL=http://filesmelt.com/][IMG]http://filesmelt.com/dl/1v1.PNG[/img][/URL] [URL=http://filesmelt.com/][IMG]http://filesmelt.com/dl/barrows.PNG[/img][/URL] [URL=http://filesmelt.com/][IMG]http://filesmelt.com/dl/home.PNG[/img][/url]#
NEW PICTURE! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2q3c6qe.png[/img]

item.title: RuneStuff PK is looking for staff and developers!
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Messer, i’ll add you on MSN in a bit and talk to you then, basically for the staff and the forum, i dont think i’ll need any help coding. Mursanari i dont need any more coders, but if i do i will contact you somehow

Read full topic
item.source: RuneStuff PK is looking for staff and developers!

item.title: RuneStuff PK is looking for staff and developers!
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

i could help im good at adding in customs i can make new training areas and add in a new home.
i can do a lil bit more email me at mursanari1@hotmail.com or instant chat.
or u can just pm me
TY

Read full topic

item.title: RuneStuff PK is looking for staff and developers!
item.dc:creator: @messer188 messer188
item.description:
@messer188 wrote:

i would like to help as much as possible! if you want message me on here and i will tell you a little about myself…or just add me on MSN if you have it...messerscape@live.com…i can make a forum and be part of the staff and some basic coding…

Read full topic
